what: Create and Deploy Surveys in Shiny
title: Create and Deploy Surveys in Shiny
text: goal package integrate flexible frontend SurveyJS library reactive backend Shiny interface database create dynamic user experiences. Whether need simple feedback form complex survey system organization, package designed scale .

title: Create and Deploy Surveys in Shiny
text: Host single survey multiple surveys one app Dynamically populate field choices (.e., response options) database table create dependent fields (e.g., select car brand filter available models) URL query tokens one-time access tokens controlled survey distribution Asynchronous worker handle database updates near real-time

title: Create and Deploy Surveys in Shiny
Create and Deploy Surveys in Shiny
text: Read survey json object host single survey. Data stored PostgreSQL database table.
code: library(shinysurveyjs)  survey <- '{   "title": "R Package Feedback",   "pages": [     {       "name": "userInfo",       "elements": [         {           "type": "rating",           "name": "rating",           "title": "Please rate the shinysurveyjs üì¶:",           "rateValues": [             {"value": 1, "text": "‚≠ê"},             {"value": 2, "text": "‚≠ê‚≠ê"},             {"value": 3, "text": "‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê"},             {"value": 4, "text": "‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê"},             {"value": 5, "text": "‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê"}           ],           "rateMax": 5         },         {           "type": "comment",           "name": "feedback",           "visibleIf": "{rating} notempty",           "title": "Why did you rate it {rating} stars?",           "rows": 2         }       ]     }   ] }'  survey_single(json = survey,               theme_color = "#00AD6E",               theme_mode = "dark")

title: Create a surveyjs UI ‚Äî surveyUI
text: id Optional id survey div container (default "surveyContainer") theme Theme name ("defaultV2" "modern") primary Primary color hex code (optional) mode Color mode ("light" "dark")

what: Survey CSS with Theme Support ‚Äî survey_css
title: Survey CSS with Theme Support ‚Äî survey_css
text: Returns CSS code needed survey Shiny application light/dark theme support.

title: Survey CSS with Theme Support ‚Äî survey_css
code: survey_css(   primary = "#003594",   primary_foreground = "#ffffff",   background = "#ffffff",   foreground = "#404040",   mode = "light",   css_string = NULL )

title: Survey CSS with Theme Support ‚Äî survey_css
text: primary Primary color hex format (default: "#003594") primary_foreground Text color primary elements (default: "#ffffff") background Background color (default: "#ffffff") foreground Main text color (default: "#404040") mode Color mode selection: "light" "dark" (default: "light") css_string Optional custom CSS string override default styles

title: Survey CSS with Theme Support ‚Äî survey_css
Survey CSS with Theme Support ‚Äî survey_css
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Light mode tags$script(survey_css())  # Dark mode tags$script(survey_css(mode = "dark"))  # Custom dark mode colors tags$script(survey_css(   theme = "dark",   primary = "#7289da",   background = "#2c2f33" )) } # }

title: Create a single survey ‚Äî survey_single
code: survey_single(   json,   show_responses = TRUE,   theme = "defaultV2",   theme_color = "#003594",   theme_mode = "light" )

title: Create a single survey ‚Äî survey_single
text: json Survey JSON string object show_responses Whether show responses submission theme Theme name ("defaultV2" "modern") theme_color Primary color hex code theme (optional) theme_mode Color mode selection: "light" "dark" (default: "light")

title: Single Survey JavaScript ‚Äî survey_single_js
text: Returns JavaScript code needed initialize handle single survey Shiny application. JavaScript code sets event handlers survey completion enables communication survey Shiny.

title: Single Survey JavaScript ‚Äî survey_single_js
text: character string containing JavaScript code survey initialization

title: Single Survey JavaScript ‚Äî survey_single_js
